name.description: Display name for the service on the DC/OS dashboard

cpus.description: CPU allocation for the API Gateway instance

mem.description: Memory (MB) allocation for the API Gateway instance

instances.description: Number of API Gateway instances to deploy (one per public agent)

marathonHost.description: Specify Marathon endpoint URL to include app name endpoints. This is used for service discovery.

advanced.description: Advanced configuration for API Gateway service

logLevel.description: Specify API Gateway log level (info or debug)

remoteConfigAWSKey.description: AWS key if using remote config with S3 source

remoteConfigAWSSecret.description: AWS secret if using remote config with S3 source

remoteConfig.description: Remote config sync source for all config files (s3://<path>, file://<path> or /<path>)

remoteConfigGenerated.description: Remote config sync source for generated files only (s3://<path>, file://<path> or /<path>)

volumeContainerPath.description: Path in container to mount for temp files

volumeHostPath.description: Path on host to mount for temp files

acceptedResourceRoles.description: Specify on which node to run (i.e. *, slave_public)
